thread.title: WATCH video of vile Rep. Keith Ellison trying desperately to tie Quebec attack to Trump
thread.title_full: WATCH video of vile Rep. Keith Ellison trying desperately to tie Quebec attack to Trump

author: Sam J.
title: WATCH video of vile Rep. Keith Ellison trying desperately to tie Quebec attack to Trump
text:
— Andrea Ruth (@AndreaNRuth) January 30, 2017 @JayCaruso @keithellison Since there has been little information on those actually involved and motivation, Prog reaction is expected. 
— DJGOLDEN (@FREE_REMARKS) January 30, 2017 
Via Jay Caruso of RedState: 
Minnesota Representative Keith Ellison was on Morning Joe today to bash President Trump’s immigrant/refugee executive order and decided to bring up the deadly shooting inside a mosque in Quebec, Canada. For some reason, he decided, without knowing who the shooters were or what their motivation was, to link Trump to the attacks. 
Of course this was all before CBC News identified the two gunmen and gosh, they weren’t Trump supporters. Trending
